```{r}
#| include: false
library(tidyverse)
```

```{css}
.grid-gallery {
  columns: 5 200px;
  column-gap: 0.5rem;
  width: 90%;
  margin: 0 auto;
}
.grid-item {
  width: 150px;
  margin: 0 0.5rem 0.5rem 0;
  display: inline-block;
  width: 100%;
  border-radius: 5px;
}
img.grid-item {
  width: 100%;
  transition: all .25s ease-in-out;
}
img.grid-item:hover {
  transform: scale(1.025);
}
```


## Group Photos

::: grid-gallery

```{r}
#| output: asis
fns <- fs::dir_ls("Group Photo/")
walk(fns, function(pic) {
  cat(str_glue("![]({{pic}}){.lightbox .grid-item loading='lazy' group='gallery'}\n\n", .open = "{{", .close = "}}"))
})
```

:::
